timeline.message: Rebase and update to the published mappings release.
Rebase and update to the published mappings release.

commits_in_main.message: Regenerate patches with relative headers. This should lower conflicts in future PRs. Convert Forge to use Official mappings. Mojang released their obfuscation mappings but we have not used them up until now due to wanting to get their license to be more explicitly permissive. It is clear that their intent is to allow us to use their names for developing mods like this. See the full wording, and our interpretation here: https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MCPConfig/blob/master/Mojang.md
Bulk update license year, and use replacement variable so that the current year is always used.

Mojang released their obfuscation mappings but we have not used them up until now due to wanting to get their license to be more explicitly permissive. It is clear that their intent is to allow us to use their names for developing mods like this. commits_in_main.message: Regenerate patches with relative headers. This should lower conflicts in future PRs. Convert Forge to use Official mappings. Mojang released their obfuscation mappings but we have not used them up until now due to wanting to get their license to be more explicitly permissive. It is clear that their intent is to allow us to use their names for developing mods like this. See the full wording, and our interpretation here: https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MCPConfig/blob/master/Mojang.md
